title: Administration by Hawaii labor relations board
context: §377-2 Administration by Hawaii labor relations board. The Hawaii labor relations board provided for in chapter 89 shall administer the Hawaii employment relations act. The board shall have a seal for the authentication of its orders and proceedings, upon which shall be inscribed the words &ldquo;Hawaii Labor Relations Board&ndash;Seal&rdquo;. [L 1945, c 250, §4; am L 1951, c 249, §1; RL 1955, §90-3; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §14; am L 1963, c 114, §1; am L 1964, c 56, §2; am L 1965, c 244, §2; HRS §377-2; am L 1985, c 251, §13] Cross References Generally, see §§26-20 and 26-34.
